item.title: Spring Spring Boot
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link https://spring.io/blog/2021/12/10/log4j2-vulnerability-and-spring-boot https://spring.io/blog/2021/12/10/log4j2-vulnerability-and-spring-boot Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Spring Boot users are only affected by this vulnerability if they have switched the default logging system to Log4J2 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-15 13:48:56 CISAGov Updated vendor link https://spring.io/blog/2021/12/10/log4j2-vulnerability-and-spring-boot. Updated community note.

item.title: Stackstate
